document_data.name: Billie
document_data.mainbody: '''Billie''' was a pet [[mammoth]] that belonged to a son of one of the well-off families of the Living City, [[Ravens Bluff]], in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Billie had a distinct orange birthmark on its abdomen. The mammoth loved receiving belly rubs and eating fruits and [[nut]]s. It was forbidden to feed Billie any [[apple]] [[cider]].
document_data.History: Billie's disappearance was announced in the [[Marpenoth]] issue of the ''[[Ravens Bluff Trumpeter]]'' in the {{YearlinkName|1370}}.{{LCRB}} The owner's parents placed a classifieds ad in the [[broadsheet]], stating that the mammoth had been recently seen near the tent city just outside the city gates of Ravens Bluff. They offered a grand reward to anyone who could return the stray creature to its owners.
